interactive-maps-for-hitman: Interactive Maps for the Hitman Series

language-modal.footer: Translations are maintained and updated by the HITMAPS™️ community. If a translation is incorrect, please {submitACorrection}.

roulette.introduction: Introducing the HITMAPS™ Roulette. Initially based on Kotti's {hitmanRoulette}, HITMAPS™ Roulette takes Kotti's work and builds off of it to add new features, including:

list-item-tournament-mode.details: Create a head-to-head matchup against your friend (or rival ;) ). Set up match durations and send the spin to your opponent via read-only spin links. These links automatically refresh each time a new spin is sent.

list-item-control.details: Don't like a specific kill condition, but don't want to lose the rest of the spin? Simply re-spin the specific condition.

list-item-overlay.details: Using the tournament mode, you can copy a link to add as a browser source in OBS to provide a professional overlay for your streams / YouTube videos.

roulette.footer: HITMAPS™ Roulette: The official roulette of Roulette Rivals

partnership.header: Official Partner of Frote's Speedrun Community
partnership.paragraph-1: HITMAPS™️ is pleased to be partnered with Frote's Speedrun Community. Back in September 2019, HITMAPS™️ promoted Speedrun Competition #2, along with all future events. We are happy to announce this official partnership, which includes both software tailed towards Frote's Speedrun Community, along with the necessary infrastructure to run the software. Frote's Speedrun Community has also offered to promote HITMAPS™️ in return as HITMAPS™️ may play an important role for participants.
partnership.paragraph-2: Frote's Speedrun Community hosts several events throughout the year, including Ghost Mode Tournaments, Roulette Rivals, and the classic Speedrun Competition. All major events involve cash prize winnings! There are also several "mini-competitions" that run on a weekly basis, as well as a creative contest from time to time.
partnership.paragraph-3: Feel free to join their Discord to be notified of future events!

notifications.checking-if-enabled: Checking to see if notifications are enabled on this device...
notifications.unsupported-browser: Unfortunately, notifications are not supported on this device. Please try to enroll using a supported device.
notifications.device-not-enrolled: Your device is currently not set up to receive notifications. Click "Enroll" below to begin setting up your device.
notifications.notifications-blocked: Your device is currently blocking notifications from hitmaps.com. Please unblock this site from your device, refresh the page, and try to enroll your device again.
notifications.announced: An upcoming Elusive Target is announced
notifications.playable: The Elusive Target arrives and becomes playable
notifications.7-days: The Elusive Target is available for 7 more days
notifications.5-days: The Elusive Target is available for 5 more days
notifications.3-days: The Elusive Target is available for 3 more days
notifications.1-day: The Elusive Target is available for 1 more day

patreon.patreon-supporters-description: Patreon helps defer HITMAPS'️ operation costs.  We'd like to extend a thank you to the people below, who have pledged at the "Master Assassin" level or higher.

map.what-would-you-like-to-do: What would you like to do?
map.click-icon-to-close: Click the {pencilIcon} icon to close the editor menu.
map.click-to-add: Click anywhere on the map to add a new item.
map.drag-to-move: Drag and drop an existing item to move it.
map.click-item-to-delete: Click on an existing item and then the "Delete" button to delete it.
map.click-ledge-to-delete: Click on an existing ledge to delete it.
map.toggle-ledge-builder: Click here to enable / disable ledge builder
map.toggle-foliage-builder: Click here to enable / disable foliage builder
map.delete-existing-region: Click on an existing region to delete it.
map.select-disguise-for-editing: Select a disguise from the dropdown below to edit its layout.
map.toggle-trespassing-builder: Click here to enable / disable trespassing region builder
map.toggle-hostile-builder: Click here to enable / disable trespassing region builder
map.click-to-copy-regions: Click here to copy disguise regions from one disguise to another
map.copy-disguises-warning: When copying, any existing target disguise regions will be deleted before copying.
map.confirm-reposition: Are you sure you want to re-position this item?
map.please-indicate-when-adding: Please indicate the following under the notes section when adding items:
map.required-items: Any required items, such as needing a wrench for loosening valves (use type "Requirement")
map.suspicious-items: Whether or not the action is suspicious when wearing a certain disguise (use type "Warning")
map.information-items: If you feel something requires more information, use the "Information" type
map.in-game-description-items: You may add the in-game description for items by using the "Description" type if there is no name field provided.
map.blank-notes: Any notes with blank text will not be added to the node
map.name: Name
map.image-url-note: Images must be linked to https://media.hitmaps.com
map.name-note: Enter the name as it appears in-game.
map.action-note: Enter the action that is performed (such as "loosen the valve", "turn on radio", "trigger fire alarm", etc.)

authentication.account-verified: Account verified! You may now log in.
authentication.unable-to-verify-account: We were not able to verify your account. Make sure you clicked the activation link from the most recent email you received, and that the link did not expire.
authentication.forgot-password-modal: Forgot your password? No problem! Enter your email below and we will send you an email with a link to reset your password.

404.image-caption: It looks like we couldn't find the page you're looking for. We asked Janus to help, but he wasn't being cooperative, despite being offered several blueberry muffins.

footer.disclaimer: HITMAN™, HITMAN™ 2, the HITMAN™ logo, images, and text are the property of {ioiLink}.
footer.hitman-status: HITMAN™ Server Status - Made With <3 by Hardware
